projects.title: Shortened URL
projects.description: Built a URL shortening service with password protection, expiration, custom URL endings, and click tracking. Designed an analytics dashboard with sorting, filtering, live updates, refresh, and copy features.

projects.title: Quiz Application
projects.description: Built a front-end quiz application with secure login, role-based dashboards, and quiz management (create, edit, delete, publish). Implemented one-time quiz attempts, real-time result display, and a dynamic leaderboard showing top 5 scorers.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Built a Netflix clone with secure authentication, allowing users to sign in, search for movies, view trailers,and watch previews in a modal on click.

projects.title: Dua Ruqyah App
projects.description: A comprehensive Islamic application for browsing and learning duas (supplications) and ruqyah with categorized content, Arabic text display, search functionality, bookmarks, and responsive design for both mobile and desktop users.

projects.title: Movie Database
projects.description: Developed a movie database web app with secure login, dynamic data handling, and features like 'Watch Later', movie comparison, search, and social sharing to enhance user interaction.

projects.title: Expense Tracker with React
projects.description: A comprehensive expense tracking application with income/expense management, category filtering, sorting functionality, and real-time balance calculations. Features include form validation, dynamic data handling, and responsive design.

projects.title: Recipe Application Using Next.js
projects.description: A comprehensive recipe application featuring dynamic recipe discovery, category-based browsing, popular recipe sorting, and responsive design. Includes recipe details, cooking times, ratings, image galleries, and email subscription functionality.
